lender.name: VanBlessed
lender.loan_because: 25$ is not really much and I am sure my money will come back in some time. GIVING money means that there is an emergency situation and that some people need help. LENDING money means that there is an every-day life problem that requires more money: once the problem is gone, you can give back the money you used and keep on living your life. I give or lend money because it's a little effort for my bank account, and because in the future I could be that person in need. Also, it's good for Karma :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a wonderful, pruod, male nurse. Also: I dance (modern).

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Looking for yet another way to make an impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes moving stuff from one place to another

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: we are all part of one big community

lender.name: Digitaldeejay.nl
lender.loan_because: We believe everybody in this world no matter where you are born, has the basic right to live a good and healthy life. But in some parts of the world this is not possible without a little help. I own a little company that sells T-shirts, and the profits from these shirts will be used for loans, and when the loan is paid back we will use it again to help somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: Internet based DJ wear (T-shirt) shop

lender.name: Koko
lender.loan_because: it's super easy, and if I can drop $7 on a coffee, I can certainly lend $25 to someone who really needs it.
